channel.title: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security for Kubernetes Workshop
channel.description: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security for Kubernetes Workshop

item.title: Vulnerability analysis with RHACS
item.description: In this first exercise we'll analyze container images for vulnerabilities.
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)

item.title: Creating customised CVE reports with RHACS
item.description: In the second exercise we'll generate and export data for a CVE campaign, using the RHACS RESTful API.
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)

item.title: Blocking vulnerable workloads from OpenShift
item.description: In the third exercise we'll block vulnerable container images from OpenShift
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)

item.title: Detecting unauthorized application behaviour at runtime with RHACS
item.description: In this exercise we'll identify and block unauthorized behaviours in container applications at runtime.
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)
